question_text: Design a scalable, real-time AI-powered fraud detection system on Google Cloud, handling millions of transactions per second. Detail its architecture and core components.
hook_text: Stop fraud in its tracks! Here's how to build a real-time AI fraud detection system on Google Cloud.
cta_text: Protect your business, subscribe for more advanced AI architectures!

answer_sections.title: Ingestion & Feature Engineering
answer_sections.text: Stream transaction data via Pub/Sub to Dataflow for real-time feature engineering.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: High-volume transaction data streams into Google Pub/Sub. Dataflow then processes these events in real-time, extracting and transforming critical features for fraud analysis.

answer_sections.title: Real-time Prediction & Decisioning
answer_sections.text: Feature Store provides low-latency data; Vertex AI for real-time fraud prediction.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Real-time features are served by Vertex AI Feature Store. Vertex AI then leverages trained models for low-latency fraud prediction, identifying suspicious activities instantly.

answer_sections.title: Alerting, Feedback & Retraining
answer_sections.text: Flag suspicious transactions. Cloud Functions for alerts. BigQuery for model retraining.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Suspicious transactions trigger alerts via Cloud Functions. All data is stored in BigQuery, feeding an automated loop for continuous model retraining and performance improvement.
